steps.title: Here’s your objective.
steps.description:
In this mission, you’ll use the Bi-blade Blender to remove a tire from the Mission Pad.

Build TRACK3R 01.

steps.title: Let’s try it out!
steps.description:
Place TRACK3R at the start position on the Mission Pad and place a tire on the circle, as shown in the image.

Download and run the program.

hints.Text:
1. Press the connect icon and follow the on-screen instructions.
2. Download and run the program.
2. Download the program to your EV3 Brick.
3. Run the program from your EV3 Brick.
